7 #include <ros/ros.h>
8 
9 #include <stdlib.h> // for rand() and RAND_MAX
10 #include <string>
11 #include <robot_agent/RobotAgent.h>
12 
13 RobotAgent::RobotAgent() {
14  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
15  initialize();
16 }
17 
18 RobotAgent::~RobotAgent() {
19 }
20 
21 void RobotAgent::initialize() {
22  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
23 
24  /*
25  * Initializing ros services
26  */
27  callTaskMang_inform = nh.serviceClient<hrc_ros::InformRobotToTaskMang>("/task_manager/robot_status_update"); // Client for the task manager service for the status update
28 
30  pointToObj = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/robot/point_to_obj");
31  grasp = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/robot/grasp");
32  cancelAction = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/robot/cancel_action");
33  planForGrasp = nh.serviceClient<std_srvs::Trigger>("/robot/planning_for_grasping");
34 
35  reset_scenario = nh.advertiseService("/robot_agent/reset", &RobotAgent::resetScenario, this);
36 
37  ROS_INFO("Robot agent is created !");
38  update();
39 }
40 
41 bool RobotAgent::resetScenario(hrc_ros::ResetRobotROSRequest &req,
42  hrc_ros::ResetRobotROSResponse &res) {
43  robot_action_taken = "";
44  robot_belief_state = "";
45  robot_real_state = "";
46  robot_immediate_reward = "";
47  robot_total_disc_reward = "";
48  initial_state_received = true;
49  newstate_info_received = false;
50  action_info_received = false;
51 
52  ROS_INFO("ROBOT ROS: Reset!");
53  res.success = true;
54  return true;
55 }
56 
57 void RobotAgent::update() {
58 
59  ros::NodeHandle n;
60  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
61  srand (time(NULL));
62  //WebSocket (WS)-server at port 8080 using 1 thread
63  server.config.port = port;
64 
65  auto& echo=server.endpoint["^/?$"];
66 
67  echo.on_open=[](shared_ptr<WsServer::Connection> connection) {
68  //cout << "Server: Opened connection " << (size_t)connection.get() << endl;
69  ros::spinOnce(); // TODO: intended to catch the reset service call
70  };
71 
72  echo.on_message=[&](shared_ptr<WsServer::Connection> connection, shared_ptr<WsServer::Message> message) {
73  ros::spinOnce(); // TODO: intended to catch the reset service call
74  string message_receive=message->string();
75 
76  cout << "Robot ROS Server: Message received: \"" << message_receive << "\"" << endl;
77 
78  string message_send = "None";
79  auto send_stream=make_shared<WsServer::SendStream>();
80  *send_stream << message_send;
81  server.send(connection, send_stream, [](const SimpleWeb::error_code& ec){
82  if(ec) {
83  cout << "Server: Error sending message. " <<
84  "Error: " << ec << ", error message: " << ec.message() << endl;
85  }
86  });
87  //cout << "Server: Sending message \"" << message_send << "\" to MDP"<< endl;
88 
89  // interprete action and state
90  std::size_t index = message_receive.find(",");
91  string robot_action = message_receive.substr(0, index);
92 
93  string remainder = message_receive.substr(index+1);
94  index = remainder.find(",");
95  string robot_state = remainder.substr(0, index);
96 
97  remainder = remainder.substr(index+1);
98  index = remainder.find(",");
99  string immediate_reward = remainder.substr(0, index);
100 
101  remainder = remainder.substr(index+1);
102  index = remainder.find(",");
103  string total_disc_reward = remainder.substr(0, index);
104 
105  // EVERY MESSAGE EITHER IS A ROBOT ACTION BELIEF UPDATE OR ROBOT REWARD UPDATE
106  // ROBOT BELIEF UPDATE RECEIVED. INFORMING ABOUT BOTH ACTION AND THE BELIEF STATE (either initial or belief state)
107 
108  if (robot_action != "-1"){
109 
110  std_srvs::Trigger::Request req;
111  std_srvs::Trigger::Response resp;
112 
113  action_taken_time = ros::Time::now();
114 
115  bool success;
116  if (robot_action == "0") { // idle
117  //Putting the actual name of the action to inform the task manager
118  robot_action = "idle";
119  success = true;
120  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is robot staying idle...");
121  }
122  else if (robot_action == "1") { // grasp
123  robot_action = "grasp";
124  success = grasp.call(req, resp);
125  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is robot grasping...");
126  }
127  else if (robot_action == "2") { // cancel all actions
128  robot_action = "cancel all actions";
129  success = cancelAction.call(req, resp);
130  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is robot canceling all actions...");
131  }
132  else if (robot_action == "3") { // point to object
133  robot_action = "point to remind";
134  success = pointToObj.call(req, resp);
135  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is robot pointing to object...");
136  }
137  else if (robot_action == "4"){
138  robot_action = "planning for grasping";
139  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is robot planning for grasping...");
140  success = planForGrasp.call(req, resp);
141  success = true;
142  }
143  else {
144  success = true;
145  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current action is robot doing nothing...");
146  }
147  ROS_INFO("ROBOT ROS: robot in belief state: %s took action: %s", robot_state.c_str(), robot_action.c_str());
148 
149  // Global variables are set below to be sent to task manager
150  robot_action_taken = robot_action;
151  robot_belief_state = robot_state;
152  action_info_received = true; // raise the action received flag
153  }
154 
155  else{
156  ROS_INFO("ROBOT ROS: robot received (prev step) reward: %s from the real state: %s | Total Disc.Reward: %s",
157  immediate_reward.c_str(), robot_state.c_str(), total_disc_reward.c_str());
158  // global variables are assigned ! These are for sending the status later to the task manager
159  robot_immediate_reward = immediate_reward;
160  robot_total_disc_reward = total_disc_reward;
161  robot_real_state = robot_state;
162  newstate_info_received = true;
163  }
164 
165  // First action and belief state is received, then the real state (the real of the belief). After both, inform the task mang.
166  if ((action_info_received && newstate_info_received) || initial_state_received){
167 
168  hrc_ros::RobotUpdateMsg update_msg;
169 
170  update_msg.stamp_robot_update = ros::Time::now();
171  update_msg.action_taken_time = action_taken_time;
172  update_msg.robot_action_taken = robot_action_taken; // took action in the belief state
173  update_msg.robot_belief_state = robot_belief_state; // belief state
174 
175  if (initial_state_received){
176  update_msg.robot_real_state = robot_belief_state; // in initial state robot mdp/pomdp sends the init state directly
177  initial_state_received = false;
178  }else{
179  update_msg.robot_real_state = robot_real_state; // new state
180  action_info_received = false;
181  newstate_info_received = false;
182  }
183 
184  update_msg.immediate_reward = robot_immediate_reward; // this reward is received from the real state (prev action taken)
185  update_msg.total_disc_reward = robot_total_disc_reward;
186 
187  hrc_ros::InformRobotToTaskMang::Request robotUpdateReq;
188  hrc_ros::InformRobotToTaskMang::Response robotUpdateRes;
189 
190  robotUpdateReq.robot_update = update_msg;
191  callTaskMang_inform.call(robotUpdateReq, robotUpdateRes);
192  }
193 
194  };
195  //See RFC 6455 7.4.1. for status codes
196 
197  //See http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_55_0/doc/html/boost_asio/reference.html, Error Codes for error code meanings
198  echo.on_error=[](shared_ptr<WsServer::Connection> connection, const SimpleWeb::error_code& ec) {
199  ros::spinOnce(); // TODO: intended to catch the reset service call
200  cout << "Server: Error in connection " << (size_t)connection.get() << ". " <<
201  "Error: " << ec << ", error message: " << ec.message() << endl;
202  };
203 
204  server.start();
205 }
